forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with numerous thunderstorms developing during the afternoon hours. High 12C. E winds shifting to N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with thunderstorms developing for the afternoon. High 53F. E winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.
